LEFT JOIN t_member temp_member ON temp_member.member_id = temp_member_auth.member_id LEFT JOIN t_user temp_infoAuditor ON temp_infoAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.info_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_vipAuditor ON temp_vipAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.vip_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_emailAuditor ON temp_emailAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.email_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_mobileAuditor ON temp_mobileAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.mobile_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_creditAuditor ON temp_creditAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.credit_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_companyAuditor ON temp_companyAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.company_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_realNameAuditor ON temp_realNameAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.real_name_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_idCardAuditor ON temp_idCardAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.id_card_auditor LEFT JOIN t_user temp_workAuditor ON temp_workAuditor.user_id = temp_member_auth.work_auditor

from t_member_auth temp_member_auth
where temp_member_auth.member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
